page.title: 09THE SHOP,HACKFORTH
page.content: { Hackforth Village post office shop is where the blacksmith's shop was many years ago.The shop is open from 8.15am to 1.pm and 2.pm to 5.30pm on Monday, Wednesday,Thursday and Friday. It is open from 8.15am to 1.pm on Tuesday and Saturday.Mrs.K.Moss is the Post Mistress today.The shop sells groceries, newpapers, sweets and ice cream. About 40 newspapers and about Â£2.00 of sweets are sold each day.The post office sells stamps and people collect their pension from here.There is also a big board on which local advertisments are displayed.The Village shop is used by many of the local people for their daily shopping. They also enjoy a good chat to each other here.
